quest.name: Brotherly Love
journal: Komuxio is pining for a wayward friend.
Komuxio fears for the safety of his friend Claxio, who has wandered off unaccompanied. He bids you find Claxio and bring him back to Little Solace.
Though you are able to find Claxio, the sylph has no intention of returning with you. Take word of this to Komuxio, who awaits at Little Solace.
According to Komuxio, tempered sylphs are prowling the area, and Claxio is in grave danger. You must track him down before he falls thrall to primal influence.

You find Claxio just in time to prevent tempered sylphs from spiriting him away. Following an emotional reunion with Komuxio, Claxio agrees to return to Little Solace. Return to the village yourself and see what Komuxio has to say.
Your efforts on his friend's behalf have earned you Komuxio's unreserved trust. Will the sylph elder be as accepting?

dialogue.name: KOMUXIO
dialogue.text: Helpful one arrives at a good time! This one needs helpful one's help!

dialogue.name: KOMUXIO
dialogue.text: One of these ones named Claxio ventured outside Little Solace alone. Alone is unsafe! Helpful one must find Claxio!

dialogue.name: KOMUXIO
dialogue.text: Claxio struck west after leaving the settlement. Hurry before Claxio ends up in the belly of a beastly one!

dialogue.name: CLAXIO
dialogue.text: What? Walking one wants this one to return to Little Solace? Don't make this one laugh!

dialogue.name: CLAXIO
dialogue.text: This one is weary of living with those who are not these ones. This one wants to be alone.

dialogue.name: CLAXIO
dialogue.text: These ones rely on walking ones for everything. No better than those ones that summoned a primal one! Small wonder this one chose to leave!

dialogue.name: CLAXIO
dialogue.text: This one thought this a likely place to build a home. But then meddling one arrives─forces this one to go deeper into the forest. Meddling one is forbidden from following this one! Away with meddling one!

dialogue.name: KOMUXIO
dialogue.text: What? Claxio refused to return to these ones, and went deeper into the forest!?

dialogue.name: KOMUXIO
dialogue.text: B-But this one saw touched ones lurking in the forest! Helpful one must hurry─hurry and find Claxio!

dialogue.name: KOMUXIO
dialogue.text: Helpful one should search for spools of thread on the forest floor. Those things will lead helpful one to Claxio. But hurry! Hurry, before touched ones take Claxio away!

dialogue.name: CLAXIO
dialogue.text: Meddling one is back!? This one told meddling one to be gone! Tell Komuxio that this one will never go back! Never!

dialogue.name: CLAXIO
dialogue.text: T-Touched ones? Touched ones should go away too! This one is good one! Every one should just leave this one alone!!!

dialogue.name: PAPALYMO
dialogue.text: Be on guard, Forename. These sylphs have been tempered―brought under the thrall of the primal Ramuh.

dialogue.name: PAPALYMO
dialogue.text: Akin to the Amalj'aa tempered by Ifrit, these sylphs exist only to serve their deity.

dialogue.name: YDA
dialogue.text: They'll not answer to words―only steel. I take no pleasure in this, but it must be done.

dialogue.name: CLAXIO
dialogue.text: Th-This one is...safe? This one was so scared...

dialogue.name: KOMUXIO
dialogue.text: Claxio! This one has been worried! So very worried! Is Claxio unharmed? Still in possession of wits?

dialogue.name: CLAXIO
dialogue.text: K-Komuxio? And meddling one as well... Why are these two here?

dialogue.name: KOMUXIO
dialogue.text: These two came to rescue Claxio! That Claxio is safe fills this one with joy!

dialogue.name: CLAXIO
dialogue.text: Komuxio...forgive this one. This one did not mean to run away from Little Solace. This one was just...afraid.

dialogue.name: CLAXIO
dialogue.text: These ones who live at Little Solace were changing─becoming friendly with other ones.

dialogue.name: CLAXIO
dialogue.text: This one feared that these ones were forgetting who these ones are...like touched ones did. But this one was wrong. This one can see that now.

dialogue.name: CLAXIO
dialogue.text: Meddling─er, helpful one. This one is grateful. This one will return to Little Solace to be with Komuxio and friendly ones.

dialogue.name: PAPALYMO
dialogue.text: Well, that should see to that. What say we return to Little Solace as well? I, for one, could do with a nice, hot bath.

dialogue.name: KOMUXIO
dialogue.text: This one thought Claxio was lost forever. Helpful one saved Claxio―now these ones can be family again.

dialogue.name: KOMUXIO
dialogue.text: This one has known many walking ones―even many kind walking ones―but helpful one is kindest and strongest of all. Helpful one is a hero to these ones.

dialogue.name: KOMUXIO
dialogue.text: Helpful one will bring these ones and walking ones closer together―this one knows. This one would take helpful one to see elder one.

dialogue.name: KOMUXIO
dialogue.text: But elder one is... Elder one is...

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Defeat the tempered sylphs!

dialogue.name: SYLPHBOSS
dialogue.text:
Claxio... These ones are your friends...
Come with these ones... Serve primal one together...

dialogue.name: CLAXIO
dialogue.text: No! This one is good one! Will never go with bad ones!

dialogue.name: SYLPHBOSS
dialogue.text:
Meddling one not smart to anger this one...
This one has many friends in the forest...

dialogue.name: PAPALYMO
dialogue.text: A morbol!? And things were going so well...

dialogue.name: CLAXIO
dialogue.text:
N-No...not stinky one! Stinky one is scary!
Stinky one's stink makes this one's head go spinning!

dialogue.name: YDA
dialogue.text: Ick! Forename―Papalymo and I can handle this beast. You take care of the sylphs!

dialogue.name: PAPALYMO
dialogue.text:
There's something not right about this morbol.
Ignore it and focus your attacks on the sylphs!

dialogue.name: YDA
dialogue.text: Hurry up, Papalymo―I can't bear this stench any longer!

dialogue.name: PAPALYMO
dialogue.text: I'm doing the best I can! If we dispatch the sylphs, surely...
